testtool.model.testmanager

Class TestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • testtool.model.testmanager.TestManager

  • public class TestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Module of the Test Tool containing all functionality related to managing the test database.

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String author,
                   java.lang.String course,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                   java.lang.String time,
                   int type,
                   int difficulty)
        Advanced search for a test(s) (entry) in the test bank (database).
        Parameters:
        author - Author of the test.
        course - The course that the test is supposed to be for.
        keywords - Keywords to search for.
        time - Time stamp of the creation of the test.
        type - Nonsense - Will be fixed soon.
        difficulty - Difficulty of the test.
